basic_information.scholarship_name: The Arete Award in Philosophy - For Excellence in Scholarship & Work/Life Balance

description: This scholarship recognizes a Philosophy student who demonstrates academic excellence and has mastered the balance of work and school life. Eligibility Requirements Philosophy Major 3.5 minimum GPA No more than 250 word essay demonstrating need and work/life balance Preference given to a student who provides a letter from employer or faculty member that speaks to their character as an employee and human being

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
